articles.author: Nathan Bomey
articles.title: Housing market at risk of "sustained downturn" as price growth cools - Axios
articles.description: A hot housing market has elevated the wealth of countless Americans in recent years.
articles.content: Driving the news: Home prices rose 2.7% in April, compared with a year earlier, down from a 3.5% jump in March, according to the S&P CoreLogic Case-Shiller U.S. National Home Price NSA Index rele… [+1773 chars]
